Error.NotEnough: You have no more of this item!

Error.AlreadySource: There is another item already providing light
Error.NotSource: There is no item providing light
Error.NotRightSource: This item is not the one currently providing light

Animations.Label: Animations
Animations.Hint: Animations that play on predefined triggers and interactions

Melee.Label: Global Melee Delay
Melee.Hint: The global delay that will be applied before melee animations

Throw.Label: Global Throw Delay
Throw.Hint: The global delay that will be applied before throw animations

Return.Label: Global Return Delay
Return.Hint: The global delay that will be applied before return animations

Ranged.Label: Global Ranged Delay
Ranged.Hint: The global delay that will be applied before ranged animations

DynamicAttacks.Label: Dynamic Attacks
DynamicAttacks.Hint: Helpers that will modify the rolls and checks based on the circunstances

MeleeToThrown.Label: Switch Melee/Thrown
MeleeToThrown.Hint: Detect if a melee attack should be a throw attack instead (automatically calculates the values and make the changes)

InventoryAutomations.Label: Inventory Automations
InventoryAutomations.Hint: Automations that target the inventory, such as removing thrown items

Remove.Label: Remove Ammo
Remove.Hint: Remove ammo from the inventory on use

Transfer.Label: Transfer Ammo
Transfer.Hint: Transfers ammo to the target's inventory on hit

DestructionChance.Label: Ammo Destruction Chance
DestructionChance.Hint: Percentage that defines the default chance of ammo being destructed on impact

Remove.Label: Remove Thrown
Remove.Hint: Remove thrown items from the inventory on use

Transfer.Label: Transfer Thrown
Transfer.Hint: Transfer thrown items from the inventory on use

DestructionChance.Label: Thrown Destruction Chance
DestructionChance.Hint: Percentage that defines the default chance of throwables being destructed on impact

ItemPiles.Label: Item Piles (integration)
ItemPiles.Hint: Integration with the Item Piles module by FantasyCalendar

MinifyName.Label: Minify Names
MinifyName.Hint: Replace the name of the item with a single special character

SnapToGrid.Label: Snap to Grid
SnapToGrid.Hint: Snaps Item Piles created by OIF to the grid

OnMiss.Label: Create Item Pile on Miss
OnMiss.Hint: When a projectile attack misses, a Item Pile is created with the ammo/thrown item on the ground

OnHit.Label: Create Item Piles on Hit
OnHit.Hint: When a projectile attack hits, a Item Pile is created with the ammo/thrown item on the ground

DebugMode.Label: Debug Mode
DebugMode.Hint: Logs useful information about what is happening inside the module

MeleeAnimationDelay.Title: Fake Delay Before Melee Animation

RangedAnimationDelay.Hint: The delay before ranged automations and interactions

DefaultThrowableDestructionChance.Hint: Percentage that defines the default chance of throwables being destructed on impact

DefaultAmmunitionDestructionChance.Title: Default Ammunition Destruction Chance
DefaultAmmunitionDestructionChance.Hint: Percentage that defines the default chance of ammuntion being destructed on impact

RemoveThrowableItem.Title: Remove Throwable Item
RemoveThrowableItem.Hint: Whether or not throwable items get removed from the inventory when thrown

AddThrowableToTargetInventory.Title: Add Throwable Item to Target Inventory
AddThrowableToTargetInventory.Hint: Whether or not throwable items get added to the target inventory when hit

AddAmmunitionToTargetInventory.Title: Add Ammunition Item to Target Inventory
AddAmmunitionToTargetInventory.Hint: Whether or not ammunition items get adedd to the target inventory when hit

CreateItemPilesOnMiss.Title: Create Item Piles on Miss
CreateItemPilesOnMiss.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles will be created when a projectile misses the target

CreateItemPilesOnHit.Title: Create Item Piles on Hit

SnapCreatedItemPilesToGrid.Title: Snap Created Item Piles to Grid
SnapCreatedItemPilesToGrid.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles created by this module should snap to grid

MinifyItemPilesNames.Title: Minify Item Piles Names

SetElevationOfItemPiles.Title: Set Elevation of Item Piles
SetElevationOfItemPiles.Hint: Whether or not Item Piles created by this module should have elevation set based on target's elevation

CurrencyGenerator.Title: Currency Generator
